detectors.description:
ERC20._transfer(address,address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Gufi.sol#70-76) can write the state variable array at will
	Dangerous write operations:
	- _balances[sender] = _balances[sender].sub(amount,ERC20: transfer amount exceeds balance) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Gufi.sol#73)
	- _balances[recipient] = _balances[recipient].add(amount) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Gufi.sol#74)

	- ERC20.allowance(address,address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Gufi.sol#50-52)

	- ERC20.transfer(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Gufi.sol#46-49)
	- ERC20.transferFrom(address,address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Gufi.sol#57-61)
